alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:59AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Noxubee, southern Oktibbeha, northeastern Winston and southwestern Lowndes Counties through 845 AM CST... At 758 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Betheden, or 9 miles northeast of Louisville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oktoc around 815 AM CST. Crawford around 820 AM CST. Brooksville around 825 AM CST. Bent Oak and Deerbrook around 830 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Artesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for northeastern and east central Mississippi.
